name: Drag Race Simulator
description:
THE GAME IS STILL IN WORK IN PROGRESS !

A simple drag race simulator with 67 cars, and 67 unique engine sounds !

I have planned to do a story mode in the future for now the game is only a "DragRace" sandbox xD

The opponents are for now always random but I'm working on a system based on the car power to makes you have fair rounds.

I'm also going to do a more realistic car upgrades shop since just changing values to the point of not being realistic isnt really  always fun.

ou can tune your car, race in 3 different beta maps.

I'm still working on that project so don't hesitate to send me message if you find any bugs :D
